meanings.sent1: The soliloquizers in the play often talk to themselves on stage.
meanings.sent2: The group of soliloquizers gathered in the park to practice their monologues.
meanings.sent3: The soliloquizers at the library whispered their thoughts aloud, amusing the other patrons.
meanings.sent4: The soliloquizers in the movie seemed to be speaking directly to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The soliloquizers in the story made their inner struggles come to life through their speeches.

meanings.definition: soliloquizers: those who engage in soliloquizing
meanings.sent1: The soliloquizers in the drama club loved performing monologues.
meanings.sent2: At the poetry slam, the soliloquizers captivated the audience with their heartfelt words.
meanings.sent3: The soliloquizers at the party took turns sharing their deepest thoughts in a dramatic way.
meanings.sent4: The soliloquizers on the street corner seemed lost in their own worlds, oblivious to passersby.
meanings.sent5: The soliloquizers in the play brought a sense of introspection to the audience with their powerful speeches.
